title: feat(desktop): Install PTY plugin and xterm.js for terminal

phases.name: Install Dependencies
phases.description: Add portable-pty to Rust and xterm.js to frontend

tasks.description: Install xterm.js and addons via pnpm

phases.summary: Added portable-pty = "0.8" to Cargo.toml. Installed xterm ^5.3.0, @xterm/addon-fit ^0.11.0, @xterm/addon-web-links ^0.12.0 via pnpm. Note: xterm v5 is deprecated, future migration to @xterm/xterm recommended.

phases.name: Verify Builds and Test Terminal
phases.description: Ensure both Rust and frontend compile, then create basic terminal test

tasks.description: Run cargo build to verify Rust compiles with PTY crate

verification: Terminal component renders in the app
